def.name: Creatinine in serum
def.display: Creatinine in dialysis fluid/Creatinine in serum or plasma

a:s.a:s: display 'Creatinine in dialysis fluid/Creatinine in serum or plasma'
// NOTE: example shows mg/dL, but no LOINC code has those units? code "eGFR result": 'egfr' from

// NOTE: Too many to pick from, needs clinical/terminological SME input, in mol/mm/m2
code "Active condition": 'active' from
